adminTab.lastShown:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating when the item was last shown. **UI Location**: Automation list element, date column, for items with feedback. **When Users See This**: When viewing a list of automation items in the 'With Feedback' tab. **Technical Context**: Part of a date display. Must be on a new line with
. **Current English**: "Last shown"
adminTab.lastOccurence:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating when the item last occurred. **UI Location**: Automation list element, date column, for items without feedback. **When Users See This**: When viewing a list of automation items in the 'Without Feedback' tab. **Technical Context**: Part of a date display. Must be on a new line with
. **Current English**: "Last occurence"
automationListElement.shownTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Count of how many times an automation has been shown (singular).
**UI Location**: Automation list element, 'Occurrences' column, for items with feedback.
**When Users See This**: When viewing automation list elements with feedback, indicating frequency.
**Technical Context**: Used when `representation.numSubmissions` is 1. Variable `number` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Shown 1 time"
automationListElement.shownTimes:
**Functional Purpose**: Count of how many times an automation has been shown (plural).
**UI Location**: Automation list element, 'Occurrences' column, for items with feedback.
**When Users See This**: When viewing automation list elements with feedback, indicating frequency.
**Technical Context**: Used when `representation.numSubmissions` is greater than 1. Variable `number` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Shown %{number} times"
automationListElement.occurenceTime:
**Functional Purpose**: Count of how many occurrences an automation has had (singular).
**UI Location**: Automation list element, 'Occurrences' column, for items without feedback.
**When Users See This**: When viewing automation list elements without feedback, indicating frequency.
**Technical Context**: Used when `representation.numSubmissions` is 1. Variable `number` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "1 occurrence"
automationListElement.occurenceTimes:
**Functional Purpose**: Count of how many occurrences an automation has had (plural).
**UI Location**: Automation list element, 'Occurrences' column, for items without feedback.
**When Users See This**: When viewing automation list elements without feedback, indicating frequency.
**Technical Context**: Used when `representation.numSubmissions` is greater than 1. Variable `number` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "%number occurrences"
automationListElement.inTrackId:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the track title and ID for an exercise.
**UI Location**: Automation list element, below the exercise title.
**When Users See This**: When viewing any automation list element.
**Technical Context**: Variables `trackTitle` and `id` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "in %{trackTitle} (#%{id})"
